Name: Melon Daiquiri #1 (served 'up')
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Cut melon into 8 segments and deseed. Cut cubes of flesh from skin of one segment and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A classic Daiquiri with the gentle touch of melon.
